subject: Automobile Racing
Tests (Drug Use)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Doping (Sports)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar has suspended the driver A. J. Allmendinger indefinitely after a test of his backup urine sample came back positive.
snippet: Nascar has suspended the driver A. J. Allmendinger indefinitely after a test of his backup urine sample came back positive.
